title: Bro Code Violation? He Wants To Date His Friend's Sister!
description:
Our Bert Show listener doesn’t seem to be familiar with the bro code. He’s been out of the dating pool for a while and thinks that he could be a little rusty with the rules of the whole thing. He’s familiar with the bro code being a thing of his teenage memory, however, he isn’t sure if the rules still apply in his 20s.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
